thread.title: 'Scream Queens' Shares New Sneak Peeks of Ariana Grande's Return
thread.title_full: 'Scream Queens' Shares New Sneak Peeks of Ariana Grande's Return

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Scream Queens' Shares New Sneak Peeks of Ariana Grande's Return
text:
Comments The episode featuring Grande's Chanel No. 2 will include a funeral and an attempt to talk to a dead person's spirit. 
" Scream Queens " continues teasing the return of Ariana Grande 's Chanel No. 2 by releasing pictures from the upcoming episode. In the said outing, the remaining of the Kappa members attempt to contact Chanel No. 2's spirit and it appears that they're successful as Chanel No. 2 is seen visiting Chanel No. 1 ( Emma Roberts ) in some photos. Another image sees a funeral, possibly of Chanel No. 2, with Chanel No. 1, Chanel No. 3 ( Billie Lourd ), Chanel No. 5 ( Abigail Breslin ), Chanel No. 6 ( Lea Michele ), Chad Radwell (Glen Powell) and more in attendance. There's also a picture of Dean Cathy Munsch ( Jamie Lee Curtis ) wearing a straightjacket while being escorted by a police officer. Titled "Beware of Young Girls", the new episode is scheduled to air Tuesday, November 3 at 9/8c on FOX. According to the synopsis, Dean Munsch is left in a desperate situation when a shocking event leads her to come face-to-face with her ex-husband's mistress. Meanwhile, in an attempt to determine who the Red Devil killer is, the Kappas use a Ouija board to communicate with Chanel No. 2 from beyond the grave and learn of a wicked plot against one of their own.
